snippet.title: Ruby Rose ~ Ace Attorney - Teaser
snippet.description:
It's here! Ruby Rose Ace Attorney is now officially playable! Follow the link below to play the game!

http://aceattorney.sparklin.org/V6_Test/player.html?trial_id=63621

--
A quick update to show what I've been planning for my next big video. I'll be doing a crossover with the Ace Attorney series and RWBY next. This project is probably going to be really big so it's going to take a while before the first episode comes out. But I just wanted to make this little sneak peak of what's to come.

I got the inspiration to do this because I love the Ace Attorney series and I recently saw someone post a video crossing over RWBY and Ace Attorney in trailer form. I figured I may as well try my hand at doing a full case, mimicking the gameplay of the series.

----
P.S. Tales of RWBY isn't dead

----
More Ruby Rose Ace Attorney here - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLM9lVP5_rVu27Qj5eUKHeLh6e_iizvGSJ
